body.bibl: Brock, Sebastian P. “The Christology of the Church of the East in the Synods of the Fifth to Early Seventh Centuries: Preliminary Considerations and Materials.” In Aksum–Thyateira: A Festschrift for Archbishop Methodios of Thyateira and Great Britain, edited by George Dion Dragas, 125–42.
